name: @rdlabo/ionic-theme-ios26
description: iOS26 CSS Theme for Ionic Framework

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && sass src/ionic-theme-ios26.scss dist/css/ionic-theme-ios26.min.css --style compressed && sass src/md-ion-list-inset.scss dist/css/md-ion-list-inset.min.css --style compressed
scripts.build:demo: cd demo && npm install && npm run build -- --configuration=production

author: Masahiko Sakakibara <sakakibara@rdlabo.jp>
